channel.title: LateNight on Lemenio
channel.description: Recent content in LateNight on Lemenio

item.title: Let me tell yah
item.description: Let me tell you what has just happened. I have criticized myself badly previously due to some of my random activities. I wonder why I did it, or at least some clues that drives my actions. But really, I don’t have the exact answer for it. I keep blaming the fault behind all of my failures is because of external conditions, and wasn’t my decisions.
